channel.title: Hugging Face Posts
channel.description: This is a website scraping RSS feed for the Hugginface trending posts.

item.title: Run DeepSeek-V3.1 locally on 170GB RAM with Dynamic 1-bit GGUFs!🐋
item.description: Run DeepSeek-V3.1 locally on 170GB RAM with Dynamic 1-bit GGUFs!🐋 GGUFs: unsloth/DeepSeek-V3.1-GGUF The 715GB model gets reduced to 170GB (-80% size) by smartly quantizing layers. The 1-bit GGUF passes all our code tests & we fixed the chat template for llama.cpp supported backends. Guide: https://docs.unsloth.ai/basics/deepseek-v3.1 See translation

item.title: Okay this is insane... WebGPU-accelerated semantic video tracking, powered by DINOv3 and Transformers.js! 🤯
item.description: Okay this is insane... WebGPU-accelerated semantic video tracking, powered by DINOv3 and Transformers.js! 🤯 Demo (+ source code): webml-community/DINOv3-video-tracking This will revolutionize AI-powered video editors... which can now run 100% locally in your browser, no server inference required (costs $0)! 😍 How does it work? 🤔 1️⃣ Generate and cache image features for each frame 2️⃣ Create a list of embeddings for selected patch(es) 3️⃣ Compute cosine similarity between each patch and the selected patch(es) 4️⃣ Highlight those whose score is above some threshold ... et voilà! 🥳 You can also make selections across frames to improve temporal consistency! This is super useful if the object changes its appearance slightly throughout the video. Excited to see what the community builds with it! See translation

item.title: Qwen Image Edit Full Tutorial: 26 Different Demo Cases, Prompts & Images, Pwns FLUX Kontext Dev
item.description: Qwen Image Edit Full Tutorial: 26 Different Demo Cases, Prompts & Images, Pwns FLUX Kontext Dev Tutorial Link https://youtu.be/gLCMhbsICEQ Extra Info I tested newly arrived Qwen-Image-Edit-Lightning-8steps-V1.0 (arrived after tutorial recorded) and definitely our existing preset which uses Qwen-Image-Lightning-8steps-V1.1 is better than it, so this tutorial and presets are still 100% best quality and up-to-date Info Qwen Image Edit just has been published and since then I have been experimenting to prepare you this amazing tutorial. I have literally shown 26 unique cases and provided demo images and prompts. After watching this tutorial your image editing skills will move to next level i promise you that. Also this tutorial will give you a lot of ideas. See translation

item.title: If
item.description: If @ clem comments on this post within the week with a task for me to classify with text and a paramater size for the model, within 48 hours I will create a new dataset, train the model, and post it all. Paramater size must be bellow 50 million params, and task can be text only, and genuinely possible. if I complete it, Clem must tell everyone on Twitter/x to follow me on huggingface and link it let's see if he comments See translation

item.title: Just applied for HF Community Grant for “Hugging Research” — a lightweight CodeAgent‑based research assistant built on Hugging Face’s Open Deep Research project for the Hugging Face Hub (models, datasets, Spaces, users, collections, papers). It gathers links via dedicated tools and organizes them for easy review.
item.description: Just applied for HF Community Grant for “Hugging Research” — a lightweight CodeAgent‑based research assistant built on Hugging Face’s Open Deep Research project for the Hugging Face Hub (models, datasets, Spaces, users, collections, papers). It gathers links via dedicated tools and organizes them for easy review. As this is for the community, comments and suggestions are appreciated: daqc/hugging-research#1 See translation

item.title: 🤖 Global AI News Stream - 100% Unmanned AI News Automation Platform
item.description: 🤖 Global AI News Stream - 100% Unmanned AI News Automation Platform 🚀 Fully Automated News Generation with Just One Keyword! Link: openfree/News-AI 🎯 Incredibly Simple: Just Enter a Keyword or URL! ✨ One Input, Complete Automation! ✨ Simply enter one keyword or one URL, and the system springs into action! 🚀 From web crawling to AI analysis, article writing, image generation, and auto-publishing - everything happens automatically. Examples: 💬 Type "GPT-5" → Instant GPT-5 news article generation! 🔗 Paste "https://openai.com/blog/..." → Auto-extracts keywords from URL and creates related articles! 🎯 Enter "Tesla Bot" → Latest Tesla Bot developments instantly generated! 💎 Key Features - One Input, Everything Done! 🔍 Smart Keyword/URL Processing Just type a keyword or paste any website URL! The system automatically extracts core keywords and gathers all relevant information to generate complete news articles. For URLs, it intelligently parses keywords from domains and paths. 🕷️ Instant...

item.title: ✅ New Article: *Relationships as Structured Reciprocity*
item.description: ✅ New Article: *Relationships as Structured Reciprocity* Title: 🤝 Relationships: Ethics as Cross-Construct Jump Series 🔗 https://huggingface.co/blog/kanaria007/structured-relationships --- Summary: Relationships are often framed as *emotion and chance*. Structured Intelligence reframes them as *reciprocal cognitive architectures*: * Trust and love as *reinforced feedback loops* * Conflict as *constraint misalignment and jump failure* * Growth as *loop stabilization through reflection and repair* > Human connection isn’t mystery — > *it’s structure that learns to align across minds.* --- Why It Matters: • Reveals *how trust, betrayal, and repair follow structural patterns* • Bridges *psychology, sociology, and cognitive modeling* • Enables *AI that supports human connection without mimicry* --- What’s Inside: • Relationships as *multi‑agent jump and memory loops* • *Attachment and reciprocity* as structural alignment • *Conflict resolution* as rollback and loop repair • Implications...

item.title: ✅ New Article: *Psychology as Structured Mind*
item.description: ✅ New Article: *Psychology as Structured Mind* Title: 🧩 Psychology: Identity Constructs and Constraint-Based Emotion 🔗 https://huggingface.co/blog/kanaria007/structured-psychology --- Summary: Psychology is often framed as *feelings, behavior, and personality*. Structured Intelligence reframes the mind as *recursive identity architecture*: * Emotion as *state feedback in cognitive loops* * Behavior as *jump execution under constraints* * Personality as *long‑term stability of structural patterns* > The psyche isn’t a mystery — > *it’s the architecture of self in motion.* --- Why It Matters: • Explains *how emotion, memory, and decision interact structurally* • Supports *reflective AI that models affect without mimicry* • Bridges *clinical insight, cognitive science, and structured reasoning* --- What’s Inside: • Psyche as *identity‑bound jump and feedback system* • *Emotional signal processing* as structural state update • *Memory loops* enabling personality and self‑coherence •...

item.title: Releasing Version 1 of the Konkani LLM
item.description: Releasing Version 1 of the Konkani LLM Konkani is a low resource Indian language spoken by 2.5 Million people Model:https://huggingface.co/Reubencf/gemma3-konkani space: Reubencf/Gemma3-konkani See translation

item.title: New Hugging Face Dataset is LIVE 🤗
item.description: New Hugging Face Dataset is LIVE 🤗 In this dataset, you’ll find 20,000+ rows of the top trending posts on X over the past several weeks. 🔥Topics Include: 🔹Bitcoin 🔹GPT-5 🔹Grok 🔹Cursor 🔹AI, Agents + Prompts 🔹Chainlink $LINK 📂Download dataset! Easily, plug it into your AI agents, LLMs or apps. MasaFoundation/X_Twitter_Trending_Topics_August2025 You can start query fresh data in our app and request API key here: https://bit.ly/4mrqbO2 See translation
